title: What is the best way to celebrate this Diwali? - Quora

response.answer_text: Celebrate this Diwali with a lot of enjoyments & cheerfulness. All government and private departments declare a holiday for every Diwali. So there no more issue to get back to your hometown, relatives place, grandparents and meet them. Share your happiness only by getting in touch with your families. Bring some delicious sweets, delightful crackers, for your loved one & celebrate this Diwali by collecting a lot of memories. Make your home as most decorative one by inviting your friends & families, also light lanterns, lamps, candles, etc. Buy best dresses for family kids, elders and make them feel pleasure. Get start your day earlier, have a bath & wear new clothes. Get greetings with family elders, which keeps you whole year blessed. Take them to the temple & make a lot of wishes for your parents, elders, friends, and family. Visit your neighbor’s house, share gifts, sweets, & crackers. Make them feel pleasure to have friends like you. Diwali is called Light of Festival. Bring home special quality crackers and make colorful lighting's. Buy good quality crackers from Festivezone, Shop Crackers Online, etc. but get aware of them, burn crackers with safe. My entire great wish is to have a safe and comfortable Diwali this year with a lot of cheerfulness in your hearts. Happy Diwali.

Diwali is a festival of lights that is generally celebrated only one day.     I have read many stories and essays from my childhood that why this Diwali is celebrated and what happened all.... Something good won on Bad or evil. Go and have a nice head bath, Sit alone for sometime and have a peace of mind for new thoughts to arise from this day that makes you grow yourself better than yesterday. But it's just still celebrating Diwali is something that burning crackers in the evening with heavy sounds and lights making lot of pollution. Children are must enthusiast in burning crackers because they are still children and don't know much about this environment.. And pollution... So, what I meant to say is crack less go green more... Enjoy with the family spending along with them.... Have Pooja in your home that makes all your relation bond go strong with no evils. Go green go clean... Crack less. Thanks for reading.
